fishychair

Hi, I'm a content creator and a streamer. I have an electrical engineering background and I like to design things in my spare time.

I hope these devices I designed can be used as a platform for tinkering and experimentation. Documentation for my designs such as example code and (soon to be added) schematics can be found around this site.
